title: Cloud Natural Language - Sentiment
abstract:
# Cloud Natural Language - Sentiment
- [JSON representation](#SCHEMA_REPRESENTATION) Represents the feeling associated with the entire text or entities in the text. Next ID: 6| JSON representation      |
|:-------------------------------------------|
| { "magnitude": number, "score": number } || Fields | Fields.1                                    |
|:----------|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| magnitude | number A non-negative number in the [0, +inf) range, which represents the absolute magnitude of sentiment regardless of score (positive or negative). |
| score  | number Sentiment score between -1.0 (negative sentiment) and 1.0 (positive sentiment).
